Subbed Projects.Show Name: Full Metal Panic! The Second Raid

Good Comments: Great job. Notes provided for military terms too.
The subtitles are well done and the little translator notes, while not necessary, are a nice touch.
Bad Comments: Lots of notes (which I like), but sometimes the main text flashed by too fast.  Either because they used too many words on a short Japanese reply or just poor TS/Timing.
Good quality subs and a decent amount of notes. ^_^

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Destiny Final Plus: The Chosen Future

Good Comments: Excellent work, going as far as to even translate the songs in foreign languages.
perfect timing and really good sub, text looking good, not blending into the background
